title: U.S . Gross Domestic Product - forecast 2019 to 2030
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall GDP in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2030.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2029 and 2030.
Maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars, about 32003.0 was reported at Year 2030
The lowest GDP in billion U.S. dollars, of value 21220.0 was reported at Year 2019
